text:
and symptoms that occur in some people when they first have sarcoidosis. Signs and symptoms may include:
                
Fever. This symptom only occurs in some people.
                
Enlarged lymph nodes (which can be seen on a chest x ray).
                
Arthritis, usually in the ankles. This symptom is more common in men than women.
                
Erythema nodosum. This is a rash of red or reddish-purple bumps on your ankles and shins. The rash may be warm and tender to the touch. Thi
